items.name: Ext.util.DelayedTask
constructor
items.text: The parameters to this constructor serve as defaults and are not required.

items.name: fn
items.text: (optional) The default function to call. If not specified here, it must be specified during the delay call.

items.name: scope
items.text:
(optional) The default scope (The **`this`** reference) in which the
function is called. If not specified, `this` will refer to the browser window.

items.name: cancelOnDelay
items.text: By default, each call to delay cancels any pending invocation and reschedules a new invocation. Specifying this as `false` means that calls to delay when an invocation is pending just update the call settings, `newDelay`, `newFn`, `newScope` or `newArgs`, whichever are passed.

items.name: id
items.text: The id of the currently pending invocation. Will be set to null if there is no invocation pending.
